content.question: The writer is considering adding a direct quotation from a source to the final paragraph. Which of the following sentences, if added to the paragraph, would most effectively support an important element of the writer’s thesis?

choices.label: Forensic anthropologist Anagnostis Agelarakis describes the finding at Eleutherna with great enthusiasm: “It signifies that women . . . held craft specialization roles in antiquity, which I think is very important.”
As forensic anthropologist Anagnostis Agelarakis notes, most people don’t realize that “bone is a live organ.”
Journalist Cara Giaimo explains that the techniques the researchers used to study the skeletal remains were also “used to figure out how gladiators fought in ancient Ephesus.”
Smithsonian writer Meilan Solly explains that “archaeologists previously unearthed the graves of four priestesses in the same Orthi Petra site [at Eleutherna]” where the skeleton was found.

content.answer: Forensic anthropologist Anagnostis Agelarakis describes the finding at Eleutherna with great enthusiasm: “It signifies that women . . . held craft specialization roles in antiquity, which I think is very important.”

skill.text: Skill 4.C: Qualify a claim using modifiers, counterarguments, or alternative perspectives.
